org.phpmaven.plugin.php
Class PhpMojoHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.phpmaven.plugin.php.PhpMojoHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPhpExecution
public class PhpMojoHelper
extends Object
implements IPhpExecution

Helper class to execute PHP scripts and PHP commands. Will be used by various mojos.

Author:
Christian Wiedemann, Tobias Sarnowski, Martin Eisengardt
